problems.description: Consider the function f(x) = 2x + 3. Find its inverse function g(x) and evaluate g(5).
problems.latex: \text{Consider the function } f(x) = 2x + 3. \text{ Find its inverse function } g(x) \text{ and evaluate } g(5).

problems.description: Given the function h(x) = \frac{x - 2}{3}, determine its inverse function f(x) and calculate f(4).
problems.latex: \text{Given the function } h(x) = \frac{x - 2}{3}. \text{ Determine its inverse function } f(x) \text{ and calculate } f(4).

problems.description: Find the inverse function of the function g(x) = \sqrt{x - 1} and find the value of g(9).
problems.latex: \text{Find the inverse function of the function } g(x) = \sqrt{x - 1} \text{ and find the value of } g(9).
